advanceTab.subTitle: Say Goodbye to Manual Data Entry
advanceTab.title: Extract Invoice Data with AI Precision
advanceTab.desc: Tired of entering invoice details manually? Our advanced AI-powered OCR technology scans and extracts key information instantly, reducing errors and saving time. Simply upload an invoice, and let AI do the work for you.

advanceTab.subTitle: Turn Unstructured Invoices into Organized Data
advanceTab.title: Every Invoice, Perfectly Sorted
advanceTab.desc: Our AI-powered system automatically organizes invoice data into a structured format, making it easy to analyze and search. No more messy spreadsheets!

advanceTab.subTitle: Manage Invoices from Anywhere
advanceTab.title: Your Data, Always at Your Fingertips
advanceTab.desc: Stay in control, whether you're at the office or on the go. Our web and mobile-friendly platform ensures you can upload, review, and manage invoices from any device, giving you the flexibility to work from anywhere

advanceTab.subTitle: Comming soon!
advanceTab.title: Connect Your Accounting & ERP Tools
advanceTab.desc: No more scattered invoice details! Our system intelligently organizes extracted data, making it searchable, structured, and ready for export. Whether you need CSV, Excel, or API integration, your data is always in the right format.
